general_info.summary: This document outlines various programs and resources offered by Sharda University, encompassing its Schools of Dental, Medical, and Nursing Sciences. It details academic initiatives like the Annual Examination Report, Academic Bank of Credits, and Curricula Feedback, alongside university resources such as the brochure, perspective plan, leadership, history, and statutory bodies. The document also highlights student support services, skill enhancement programs, innovation and entrepreneurship initiatives, radio services, and important guidelines for students regarding visas, FRO/FRRO, and medical insurance, as well as a mentoring portal.

career_info.summary: This text appears to be a list of categories or links related to a university or educational institution. It includes information about global knowledge seekers, recruiters, career paths in allied health sciences, COVID-19 updates, specific campus locations (Uzbekistan and Agra), courses on human values and professional ethics, a national cyber crime reporting portal, and an international credit transfer program.
